about_the_game:
Demo UPDATE!

Please, enjoy an improved Demo which includes:
  • New pretty cutscenes,
  • A charming detective and several new NPCs,
  • New little quests,
  • Autosave system,
  • Re:do can run! ^^
  • A couple of Easter eggs, and many minor adjustments.
______

「Pretty Dreadful」 is a story driven point & click adventure about a guy called Re:do. Like many of us, he had big dreams and goals he tried to achieve in a big city. However, having graduated, he realized that he doesn’t know what to do with his life. Eventually, he finds himself alone and lonely.

Re:do believes he is a regular guy who is destined to have a regular life. And the fact that he cannot remember a thing from his own past doesn’t bother him… or maybe does a little. At the moment when he finds himself at his lowest, Re:do’s past comes after him.

A strange but familiar two-tailed fox visits him in his dreams. Creepy creatures start walking among people but no one seems to notice them. Re:do has to remember who he was and who he is. And his destiny is not what he thought it would be, at all.

Features:
  • Story driven adventure game.
  • Pretty anime-like art-style with a bit of creepiness.
  • Simple puzzles meant to complete the gameplay without challenging your skills.
  • Vibe of old Japan from the 90-s.
  • A mystery that is yet to be revealed.

short_description: Re:do left his quiet life in a village to pursue his career dreams in a big city. However, time passed and after graduation the guy found himself lonely and lost, not knowing what to do with his life. And that’s when Re:do’s past came after him and called him back…
